sites.name: marxists.org
sites.title: [[{$('header.title h1').text()}]]
sites.include:
[[{(()=>{let html=''; html+=`

${$('.title1').text()}

`; html+=`

${$('.date').text()}

`; html+=`

${$('h3[style="text-align: center"]').text()}

`; html+=`

${$('p[align="center"]').text()}

`; return html})()}]]
